title: 24. "Go Ahead and Free Yourself" Overcoming Abandonment Issues
itunes:title: 24. "Go Ahead and Free Yourself" Overcoming Abandonment Issues
description:
Hey Girl Hey!

 

This week's topic is overcoming abandonment issues! In this episode we get into deep topics like: the origins of abandonment issues, what abandonment looks like, how abandonment affects our habits, and how abandonment affects our self esteem.

 

Head on over here to my website (www.beatricekamau.com if the link is not clickable for you) to get your FREE downloadable PDF guide on the 5 Daily Tips on How to Stop Caring What Other People Think.

 

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
